_classes.title: Classes
_classes.description: Used to style or manipulate the look and feel of this Component. These are predefined in the theme or added in Project Settings > Custom CSS/Less code.

_isOptional.title: Is this optional?
_isOptional.description: An optional component does not have to be completed by the user.

_isAvailable.title: Is this available?
_isAvailable.description: Controls whether this component is available in the course or not.

_isHidden.title: Is this hidden?
_isHidden.description: Enabling this is equivalent to applying the CSS 'display:none' to the component.

_isVisible.title: Is this visible?
_isVisible.description: Disabling this is equivalent to applying the CSS 'visibility:hidden' to the component.

_ariaLevel.title: Aria level
_ariaLevel.description: If you need to override the default component ARIA level (as defined in Configuration Settings), set this to any number greater than 0.

displayTitle.title: Display title
displayTitle.description: When viewing a component - this is the title that will be displayed
